price: 10 Que tu les mettes en garde ou non, ils ne croiront pas.
arabic: وَسَوَآءٌ عَلَيۡهِمۡ ءَأَنذَرۡتَهُمۡ أَمۡ لَمۡ تُنذِرۡهُمۡ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: wasawāon ʿalayhim a-andhartahum am lam tundhir'hum lā yu'minūna
